verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:26
verses.text: I suppose therefore that this is good for the present distress, I say, that it is good for a man so to be.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:27
verses.text: Art thou bound unto a wife? seek not to be loosed. Art thou loosed from a wife? seek not a wife.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:28
verses.text: But and if thou marry, thou hast not sinned; and if a virgin marry, she hath not sinned. Nevertheless such shall have trouble in the flesh: but I spare you.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:29
verses.text: But this I say, brethren, the time is short: it remaineth, that both they that have wives be as though they had none;
